title: Rambles in Europe in 1839. With sketches of prominent surgeons, physicians, medical schools, hospitals, literary personages, scenery, etc
author: Gibson, William
snippet: I called upon Mr. Wardrop at his residence in CharlesStreet, and introduced myself as an old acquaintance, andwas gratified to find he should have recollected me, afterthe lapse of so long a time, as one of the companions ofhis favourite pupil De Souza—a young Portuguese ofgreat talent and promise, who perished prematurely,much regretted by all his friends, and by none more sincerely than by his affectionate preceptor.
